response.original_title: 世にもエロスな物語～色香～
response.overview: The 1st story, Aki was married in arranged marriage. Her husband, who was much older than her and treated her harshly, like a servant. The rice merchant who frequented the store fell in love with Aki, and Aki also had feelings for him. One day, her husband finds out about their relationship and imprisons Aki. The 2nd story, my husband left me for another woman and now I live with my father-in-law. A gang came asking to repay dept. Then Father-in-law paid off his son's debts. His kindness made Hanayo's heart turn to her father-in-law, and the two became a couple. The 3rd story, Ai Uehara and her husband are a very close couple, but Ai's problem is that sex with her husband is too bland and she can't orgasm. One day, Ai is invited to a barbecue party by Miyuki, and a man named Katayama that tells her, "You're a masochist." Ai was caught in a trap set up by Miyuki and Katayama to train her. Ai visits Katayama's house prepared to be trained then she becomes addicted to sensual pleasure.
response.title: The World's Most Erotic Story: Sensual Pleasure
